TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TabRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class TabRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TabRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有视觉样式的选项卡控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a tab control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组 `static` 方法，这些方法可用于使用操作系统的当前视觉样式呈现选项卡控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应具有当前视觉样式的外观，此方法非常有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制选项卡控件，请使用 方法绘制页面，并使用 方法绘制每个选项卡。To draw a tab control, use the method to draw the page, and use the method to draw each tab. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则此类的方法将绘制具有当前视觉样式的选项卡控件。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style. 否则，此类的方法和属性将引发 。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，请检查属性的值 。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the property. 此类包装 设置为类公开的元素之一的的功能 。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个自定义控件，该控件使用 和 方法绘制一个具有两个选项卡的基本选项卡控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a basic tab control with two tabs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 绘制用于在选项卡控件中选择页的选项卡。

span.span: Draws a tab that is used to select a page in the tab control.

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };
member this.IsSupported : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 类能否用于绘制具有视觉样式的选项卡控件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a tab control with visual styles.

value.span: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .
